name: Stranded Near Nowhere
description:
Your car breaks down in the desert. Explore the town, find help, beware of Fog. Unravel the history of a mysterious town as you try to escape.

-Controls can be found in the main menu under Options>Controls

-Current level can be restarted from pause menu Escape>Restart Current Level, all levels can be loaded from main Menu>Load

Hey there, thanks for stopping by! This is my first full game, made in Unreal Engine hope you enjoy. 

If you'd like to see more consider making a donation.
